ValidationRule.description: "Overview" is required to mark as complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Activity', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Short_Course', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Unit', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Module' ),
ISPICKVAL( ProductRequestID__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), AND( NOT (ISCHANGED( Design_Form_Status__c ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Design_Form_Status__c , 'Design Form Sent'), ISPICKVAL( Design_Form_Status__c , 'Design Form Received') ) ), LEN( Overview__c )=0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Overview" is required to mark as complete.
